title: Crime Alert 12.02.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.02.20
description:
Driver speeds off during traffic stop with cop hanging onto the car. He gets 80 years for attempted murder. Ex-girlfriend stalk new girlfriend, creating profile on dating site for quick hookups.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
